name: aleph
title: Aleph Tools
description: A set of text tools to work with Hebrew text in Raycast.
author: d7mtg

commands.name: remove
commands.title: Remove Niqqud
commands.description: Removes all niqqud from your current selection and paste it back to your selection.

commands.name: reverse
commands.title: Reverse Text
commands.description: Reverses the order of the letters in your current selection and paste it back to your selection.

commands.name: to-hebrew
commands.title: To Hebrew
commands.description: Converts your current selection to Hebrew and paste it back to your selection.

commands.name: to-latin
commands.title: To Latin
commands.description: Converts your current selection to Latin and paste it back to your selection.
